channel.title: Intrepid - Hern [Downtempo? idfk]
channel.description:
New EP of stuff that I've been working on on the side while taking a break from some bigger projects. Sound is a lot more melodic and jazz inspired than that stuff.
Total runtime - 19:46
Intrepid - 2:15 Teleport - 5:15 Distance - 5:36 Oh - 6:39
Link is here: https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/sets/intrepid
Hope you guys enjoy, constructive criticism is welcome as always.
